articles.title: Liverpool believe FIFA has no basis to prevent Premier League clubs from selecting Brazilian players this weekend - Sky Sports
articles.description: Liverpool believe FIFA has no basis with which to ban Premier League clubs from selecting South American players who were refused permission to go on internationals.

articles.author: Mostafa Salem, Kylie Atwood and Laura Smith-Spark, CNN
articles.title: Taliban to allow 200 people including Americans to fly out of Kabul airport - CNN
articles.description: About 200 people, among them US nationals, have been cleared by the Taliban to leave Kabul on a Qatari flight, a source with knowledge of the matter told CNN on Thursday.
articles.content:

articles.title: The FBI Releases New Video Of The Suspect Who Planted Bombs Before The Capitol Riot - NPR
articles.description: The FBI is asking the American public to review the new information and come forward with any information about the possible identity of the bomb-maker.
articles.content:
